value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Ahh, Reginn, there you are.
You've been gone so long...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ótr!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|...So long you forget your place.
You will learn to refer to me
as milord eventually.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But what is this? What are you up to?
Did you forget your orders were to
return with the summoner?$k$pOr did you simply decide you would
rather picnic with the enemy army?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no... That's not...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You must be the brother of
King Fáfnir. Prince Ótr, is it?
I am Alfonse, Prince of Askr.$k$pWe believe there to be good reason
for us to cooperate with Reginn.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Cooperate? ...What is the meaning
of this, Reginn?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Brother, I—$k$pI can't do it anymore. I can't keep
on invading country after country
while our people suffer!$k$p$EFace_Cool|And the two of you...I can't stand
it anymore! I want my brothers back.
Please, Brother...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Please?! You ask me to join forces
with our enemy and war against
the mighty Niðavellir?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Yes! That's exactly right!$k$p$EFace_Cool|He can't be allowed to continue
inflicting pain on the world. I swear
I'll stop him... Even if it kills me!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|...Hah...heh heh... Ah-hahahaa!
Even if it kills you, you said?
Eh-heh-hahh... Hmmm...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Prince Ótr?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Dahaha-HA-HAA! It's perfect!
Yes, this will do just fine.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Reginn, you are my sister no longer.
As of now, you are my enemy!$k$pYou've forsaken your homeland,
and for that, I will run you through
without hesitation!$k$pYour only value to me now
is as food for the dogs!$k$p$EFace_Smile|And then... Then! Then I will be the
only family our dear brother has left!
HahahaHAHH!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-Brother, no!$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|How can you be so cruel?! Princess
Reginn is your only sister, isn't she!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Cruel? She's done this to herself.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Now, I have work to do and no time
to waste breath on you. Leave me the
summoner and begone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Damn it. You may have forced
my retreat for now...$k$pBut the sage's forest lies ahead.
You will not pass what awaits you
so easily.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ótr...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Such spite! If my brother said
anything like that to me, I'd be
curled up in a ball, sobbing.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|He may seem hateful now,
but Ótr was once very kind.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|Rage has overpowered them,
both Fáfnir and Ótr.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I need to learn why. I need to fix it,
so they don't suffer anymore—or
bring more suffering to others.$k$p$EFace|If I can do that, the wars will stop,
and we can all live in peace! Right?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I hope so, Princess Reginn...$k$pFirst, I have to ask... You wanted to
capture $Nu for...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Ótr ordered me to do it. But he never
bothered to explain why. At least,
not to me.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm. Of course. What does he plan
to do once he has—$k$p$EFace_Smile|Oh, sorry, $Nu...
You needn't worry.$k$pHe will never get a chance to lay
a single finger on you! That said,
we should move. To the forest!$k$p$Sbs150|
